title: Advanced Flags and Arguments
description: Build a File Manager CLI that demonstrates advanced flag and argument handling with Cobra, including global flags, command-specific flags, required/optional flags, and different flag types.
short_description: Master Cobra's flag system by building a file management CLI with complex flag handling
learning_objectives: Understand Cobra flag types and binding
Create user-friendly CLI help and usage
real_world_connection: Professional CLI tools like kubectl, docker, and git heavily rely on sophisticated flag systems for user interaction and configuration management.
requirements: Implement global --verbose flag available to all commands
Create 'copy' command accepting source and destination arguments
Create 'delete' command with required --force flag for safety
Implement proper flag validation and error handling
Support help text generation for all flags
bonus_points: Add flag aliases (short forms like -v for --verbose)
